title: NATO may ask for China's support in Afghanistan

content: Essantor, in response to your comment in that thread, I don't think it would make any difference in how they have dealt with their homegrown insurrections. They would likely send professionals who were carefully trained to follow orders of restraint and necessary violence, if for no other reason than to make a favorable impression on the rest of the world.
